Detailed Description

Matchers that inspect objects.

Define Documentation

#define hasDescription   HC_hasDescription

Synonym for HC_hasDescription, available if HC_SHORTHAND is defined.

Function Documentation

id<HCMatcher> HC_hasDescription ( id  matcherOrValue  ) 

Evaluates whether [item description] satisfies a given matcher.

Examples:

  • hasDescription(startsWith(@"foo"))
  • hasDescription(@"bar")

Synonym: hasDescription

Parameters:
matcherOrValue A matcher, or a value for equalTo matching.
See also:
